name: studentmasterplan
description: Project to capture Student Master Plan

scripts.build: webpack -d && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && webpack-dev-server --content-base src/ --inline --hot --port 8081
scripts.build:prod: webpack -p && cp  src/index.html dist/index.html && webpack-dev-server --content-base src/ --inline --hot
